bike.description: S-Works E5 SLX, fully manipulated tubing, semi-compact cyclo-cross race design

components.description: Specialized FACT carbon cyclocross, carbon legs, aluminum steerer, Speed Zertz inserts
S-Works Mindset, 1 1/8" integrated threadless, sealed stainless steel cartridge bearings, carbon 20mm cone with two 5mm carbon spacers
Specialized Pavé, FACT carbon seatpost with Zertz insert, 27.2mm
Chain stay protector, reflectors, chain catcher, F & R brake cable stops, clear coat, owners manual
